com.sun.xacml.ctx
Class Subject

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.xacml.ctx.Subject

public class Subject
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the collection of Attributes associated with a particular subject.

Since:
1.1
Author:
seth proctor
